title: Big Ben and Westminster Palace
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,086 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 1000L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and Z1
description: Home to British royalty for hundreds of years, and now home to the British government, Westminster Palace has quite a history. Big Ben, the bell that chimes from the Elizabeth Tower every fifteen minutes, is part of one of the of the most recognizable sights in the world. Students will enjoy learning about Westminster's incredible history.
